@Ron wrote:

Yeah, but generally is not always. Next revision of SRL, they should make damn sure their global variables are queer (When I say Queer, I mean Odd, not Gay).

item.title: Duplicate Identifier
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

KyleGut3:

It might not necessarily be “SRL sharing with forms”, anytime SRL declares a global variable, and you use it in the script, you’ll get that error.

SRL needs to use odd variable names like Lable_0001, Label_0002, etc so they don’t conflict with users scripts. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:

It might not necessarily be “SRL sharing with forms”, anytime SRL declares a global variable, and you use it in the script, you’ll get that error.

item.title: Duplicate Identifier
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Alright, I just made a form, and I already got an error, which is pretty gay.

Basically, I get this message:

Failed when compiling Line 41: [Error] (14723:1): Duplicate identifier 'Label1' in script F:\SCAR\Scripts\myproj\xxxxx\xxxxx.scar

[scar]program whatevs;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Fighting.scar}

const
StartPlayer = 0; // Determines who will play first

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
Label4 : TLabel;
Label5 : TLabel;
Label6 : TLabel;
Username1 : TEdit;
Password1 : TEdit;
Nickname1 : TEdit;
ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
ComboBox2 : TComboBox;
ComboBox3 : TComboBox;
Button1 : TButton;
Button2 : TButton;
Button3 : TButton;
Button4 : TButton;

procedure InitForm;
begin
…

Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);

…
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;

var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;

begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;

begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure Button1Click(sender: TObject);
begin

end;

procedure Button2Click(sender: TObject);
begin

end;

procedure Button3Click(sender: TObject);
begin
WriteLn(‘Good job, you filled out a form!’);
frmDesign.Caption := frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult :=mrOk;
end;

procedure Button4Click(sender: TObject);
begin

end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
procedure DisguiseScar(‘iTunes’);

end.[/scar]

I don’t see where I identified Label1 more than once… Any help?

Thanks.

EDIT: NVM, I just did a search for it, lol…but what else does SRL share with forms?

Read full topic
